short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collection of small & convenient XML tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes you need to finish some simple tasks on XML processing like XML to CSV/JSON/YAML, or you need to manipulate XML data like prettifying, minifying or encoding them. This extension can help you get them done easily. 

Just paste what you want to process, and click on start button, then wait for the result to come out. It is fast and effective! 

14 tools are available for now and more tools will be added to the extension in a regular basis. 

- Prettify XML: formats XML data to easy-to-read form
- Minify XML: minifies and compresses XML data
- XML to JSON: converts XML data to JSON format
- JSON to XML: converts JSON data to XML format
- XML to CSV: converts XML data to CSV format
- CSV to XML: converts CSV data to XML format
- XML to YAML: converts XML data to YAML format
- YAML to XML: converts YAML data to XML format
- XML to TSV: converts XML data to TSV format
- TSV to XML: converts TSV data to XML format
- Base64 Encode: converts XML data to Base64-encode format
- Base64 Decode: converts Base64-encoded data to original XML
- URL Encode: converts XML data to URL-encode format
- URL Decode: converts URL-encoded data to original XML

Enjoy the ease of use offered by our XML tools! Additionally, we've provided links to other tool extensions we've developed, including JSON, CSV and ChatGPT, for your convenience.

CHANGELOG

- Update the list of more tools

Version 0.1.0 - 2022-06-20
